name: Miner's Lunacy
description:
Miner's Lunacy is a thrilling horror game about escaping an abandoned mine. You need to collect the 3 missing pieces of the elevator to fix it and make it out. 

But watch out! Wandering in the dark can make anyone go insane, and in this mine going insane has an effect on the mine as well...

Luckily you have your trusty lantern with you, use it to shine light in the mine to keep your sanity, lets hope it does not run out before you make it out alive...

Highly recommended to play the game with audio as it is a core part of the experience.

This game was made in 5 days as part of a self set challenge under the theme of 'Endless Night'.

Controls: (keyboard only)

WASD to move.

Mouse to look around.

F to turn the lantern on or off.

E to interact.

ESC to open pause menu.
